Reviews.Content: Dirty room  This was the worst motel we've stayed in since 2001 and that's a lot of motels, around the country and the world. The floor in mirror counter/sink area was stained with what may have been blood. The shower faucet didn't work at all until I spent 5 minutes refastening it to the valve. The blanket looked like it was previously used to clean a car engine compartment and two light bulbs wee burned out. The place was really dirty. In the AM we asked for a manager and told her the room condition was terrible. She immeadiatly gave us a full refund without questions, so we suspect she was painfully aware of the bad conditions in her motel. Since Accor group acquired motel 6, they have improved a lot, but, unfortunatly, not the Dallas Southwest location.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
